attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to get the government to give more money to our troops who are risking their lives day in and day out without proper equipment, they need the money for basic equipment to survive in the hostile places such as afganistan and iraq.
Please sign and save a soldiers life by getting the government to agree.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
